snippet: A 1995 video enjoying a viral moment this week in 2012 in which a class of fifth graders answers the question, “Hey, why should I be on the Internet?”
abstract: A 1995 video enjoying a viral moment this week in 2012 in which a class of fifth graders answers the question, “Hey, why should I be on the Internet?”

headline.main: Video: Fifth Graders in 1995 Predict How We'll Use the Internet
